entry.title: Python Tools for Visual Studio 2010
entry.summary: Adds support for Python to Visual Studio.
entry.longSummary: Adds support for the Python programming language to Professional, Ultimate, and the "integrated shell" versions of Visual Studio.

entry.title: Python 2.7
entry.longSummary: Python is a dynamic, object-oriented, open source programming language.

entry.title: Python Installation Detector
entry.longSummary: Includes a set of tools useful for detecting previous installations of CPython.

entry.title: distribute module (Python)
entry.summary: Python's distribute module (prereq for installing PyPI)
entry.longSummary: Distribute is a fork of the Setuptools project.

entry.title: PyPI
entry.longSummary: Python Package Index is a repository of freely available Python software.

entry.title: Django 1.4
entry.longSummary: Django is a high-level Python Web framework.

entry.title: Windows Azure SDK for Python Core
entry.summary: Python development support for Windows Azure.
entry.longSummary: The Windows Azure SDK for Python provides developers with Python modules and packages for building scalable services for deployment to Windows Azure.

entry.title: Windows Azure SDK for Python
entry.summary: Python development support for Windows Azure within Visual Studio.
entry.longSummary: The Windows Azure SDK for Python provides developers with Python frameworks, packages, and Microsoft Visual Studio tools (if installed) for building scalable services for deployment to Windows Azure.

entry.title: Visual Studio 2010 Shell (Integrated)
entry.summary: The Visual Studio 2010 Shell (Integrated) Redistributable Package contains the runtime binaries that are required to deploy an application that is based on the Visual Studio 2010 Shell (Integrated).
entry.longSummary: The Visual Studio Shell (integrated mode) provides the foundation on which you can seamlessly integrate tools and programming languages within Visual Studio. The Visual Studio Shell (integrated mode) does not contain any programming language, so it provides the perfect foundation to deploy a development environment for your own language. The Visual Studio Shell (integrated mode) seamlessly integrates with Visual Studio 2010 Professional and above. Any tools and programming languages that run inside the Visual Studio Shell (integrated mode) will run together with Visual Studio 2010 if they are also installed on the same machine. By using the Visual Studio Shell (integrated mode), you will not need to make Visual Studio a pre-requisite on your user machines.

incompatibleProduct.errorMessage: You must uninstall Beta 1 of Visual Studio 2010 before you can install Visual Studio 2010 Shell (Integrated).
You must uninstall Beta 2 of Visual Studio 2010 before you can install Visual Studio 2010 Shell (Integrated).
You must uninstall Beta 2 of Visual Web Developer 2010 Express before you can install Visual Studio 2010 Shell (Integrated).
You must uninstall Beta 2 of Visual Basic 2010 Express before you can install Visual Studio 2010 Shell (Integrated).
You must uninstall Beta 2 of Visual C# 2010 Express before you can install Visual Studio 2010 Shell (Integrated).
You must uninstall Beta 2 of Visual C++ 2010 Express before you can install Visual Studio 2010 Shell (Integrated).
You must uninstall Visual Studio 2010 RC before you can install Visual Studio 2010 Shell (Integrated).

terms.termsText: -Visual Studio will receive and display online RSS content. For further information refer to the Readme link.

entry.title: Windows Azure Tools for Microsoft Visual Studio 2010 - November 2011
entry.summary: Add-on for Microsoft Visual Studio 2010 for developing Windows Azure applications.
entry.longSummary: Windows Azure Tools for Microsoft Visual Studio 2010 extends Visual Studio 2010 and Visual Web Developer 2010 Express Edition to enable you to create, build, debug, run, and package scalable services on Windows Azure.

registry.keyPath: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows Azure Tools for Microsoft Visual Studio\10.0\1.6
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Windows Azure Tools for Microsoft Visual Studio\10.0\1.6
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows Azure Tools for Microsoft Visual Studio\10.0\Core
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Windows Azure Tools for Microsoft Visual Studio\10.0\Core

incompatibleProduct.errorMessage: You must uninstall Beta 1 of Visual Studio 2010 before you can install Windows Azure Tools for Visual Studio 2010.
You must uninstall Beta 2 of Visual Studio 2010 before you can install Windows Azure Tools for Visual Studio 2010.
You must uninstall Beta 2 of Visual Web Developer 2010 Express before you can install Windows Azure Tools for Visual Studio 2010.
You must uninstall Visual Studio 2010 RC before you can install Windows Azure Tools for Visual Studio 2010.
